name: Orc Hunter VR
description: In the roomscale VR wavegame Orc Hunter you have to defend yourself against endless hordes of orcs. To do so you can either use swords in close combat or fight them with a bow or magic staff from a distance.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel i5-4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space Additional Notes: a large tracking area is recommended
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel i5-4590 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 980 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space Additional Notes: a large tracking area is recommended
